titles.title: Designating Northwest Coast Art as a rare and valuable national treasure.
Designating Northwest Coast Art as a rare and valuable national treasure.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution recognizes that Northwest Coast Art remains a major cultural force in many Indigenous communities and contributes to the heritage and cultural diversity of this nation. It also recognizes that Northwest Coast Art should be protected under U.S. law.
